verses.verse: Now <S%H2063>these<s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, that ye might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it:

That <S%H4616><s%> thou mightest <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee, <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life;<s%> and <S%H4616>that<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged.<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> therefore, O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it; <S%H834>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and <S%H834>that<s%> ye may <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H3966>mightily,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee, in the <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%> LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H3966>might.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> thine heart: <S%H3824><s%>

And thou shalt teach them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>children,<s%> and shalt <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and when thou <S%H1980>walkest<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and when thou liest <S%H7901>down,<s%> and when thou risest <S%H6965>up.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house,<s%> and on thy <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1129>buildedst<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%>

And <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2898>good<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H4390>filledst<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> and <S%H953>wells<s%> <S%H2672>digged,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H2672>diggedst<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and olive <S%H2132>trees,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H5193>plantedst<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> when thou shalt have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and be <S%H7646>full;<s%>

Then <S%H8104>beware<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and shalt <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> of the <S%H4480>gods<s%> <S%H430><s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you;

(For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you) <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against thee, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thee from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5254>tempt<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye <S%H5254>tempted<s%> him in <S%H4532>Massah.<s%>

Ye shall diligently <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and that thou mayest go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%>
To cast <S%H1920>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asketh<s%> thee in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean the <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you?

Then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> We <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714><s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> hand: <S%H3027><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>sore,<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and upon <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>household,<s%> before our eyes: <S%H5869><s%>

And he brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he might bring us <S%H935>in,<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> for our <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3605>always,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that he might preserve us <S%H2421>alive,<s%> as it is at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> our <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.
